analysis.description:
Slot.distributeRemaining (/unique_chucks/22/0x0848e84aa70274c1e51d71564bde2211ee0406f7.sol#368-384) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- fund.transfer(DIV_DIST) (/unique_chucks/22/0x0848e84aa70274c1e51d71564bde2211ee0406f7.sol#378)
	- msg.sender.transfer(GAS_REFUND) (/unique_chucks/22/0x0848e84aa70274c1e51d71564bde2211ee0406f7.sol#382-383)

Slot.awardPrizes (/unique_chucks/22/0x0848e84aa70274c1e51d71564bde2211ee0406f7.sol#340-364) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- winnerIndex == jackpotNumber

Slot.buyTicketsFor (/unique_chucks/22/0x0848e84aa70274c1e51d71564bde2211ee0406f7.sol#305-320) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ticket.mint(_beneficiary,numberOfTickets) (/unique_chucks/22/0x0848e84aa70274c1e51d71564bde2211ee0406f7.sol#317)

Slot.awardPrizes has external calls inside a loop:
	- participants[gameNumber][winnerIndex % SIZE].transfer(prizes[i]) (/unique_chucks/22/0x0848e84aa70274c1e51d71564bde2211ee0406f7.sol#356-357)

Slot.refundGameAfterLongInactivity has external calls inside a loop:
	- participants[gameNumber][i].transfer(PRICE) (/unique_chucks/22/0x0848e84aa70274c1e51d71564bde2211ee0406f7.sol#405)

Reentrancy in Slot.buyTicketsFor (/unique_chucks/22/0x0848e84aa70274c1e51d71564bde2211ee0406f7.sol#305-320):
	External calls:
	- ticket.mint(_beneficiary,numberOfTickets) (/unique_chucks/22/0x0848e84aa70274c1e51d71564bde2211ee0406f7.sol#317)
	External calls sending eth:
	- addParticipant(_beneficiary,numberOfTickets) (/unique_chucks/22/0x0848e84aa70274c1e51d71564bde2211ee0406f7.sol#317-319)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- counter (/unique_chucks/22/0x0848e84aa70274c1e51d71564bde2211ee0406f7.sol#317-319)
	- gameNumber (/unique_chucks/22/0x0848e84aa70274c1e51d71564bde2211ee0406f7.sol#317-319)
	- gameStartedAt (/unique_chucks/22/0x0848e84aa70274c1e51d71564bde2211ee0406f7.sol#317-319)
	- jackpotAmount (/unique_chucks/22/0x0848e84aa70274c1e51d71564bde2211ee0406f7.sol#317-319)
	- participants (/unique_chucks/22/0x0848e84aa70274c1e51d71564bde2211ee0406f7.sol#317-319)

SlotTicket.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/22/0x0848e84aa70274c1e51d71564bde2211ee0406f7.sol#238-241)
SlotTicket.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/22/0x0848e84aa70274c1e51d71564bde2211ee0406f7.sol#234-236)
SlotTicket.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/22/0x0848e84aa70274c1e51d71564bde2211ee0406f7.sol#241)
SlotTicket.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/22/0x0848e84aa70274c1e51d71564bde2211ee0406f7.sol#241)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/22/0x0848e84aa70274c1e51d71564bde2211ee0406f7.sol#342-345:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
